channel.title: Can you please tell me what I'm doing wrong?
channel.description:
Ok im going to show you pro's what i do and hopefully you guys can tell me what i am doing wrong?(:
NOTE; I am a newbie so take it easy on me.
1. Right here I am opening up the client.java to change the ip to my 'example.no-ip.biz'. [img]http://imgtool.in/img/1iwi.png[/img]
2. Ok here I am just hitting that compiler!:) [img]http://imgtool.in/img/2qmq.png[/img]
3. Ok here I am port forwarding with utorrent ( as I don't know my user+pass for router and default doesnt work). [img]http://imgtool.in/img/3gzg.png[/img]
4. Here I am running DUP 3.0 (No-IP). [img]http://imgtool.in/img/4fgf.png[/img]
5. I think thats all I had to do, now I go ahead and try to login. ( I get this error ).. [img]http://imgtool.in/img/5imi.png[/img]
Please if you see me mising anything or I did anything wrong please tell me, thankyou!

item.title: Can you please tell me what I'm doing wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

ur ment to keep it at 127.0.0.1 when self hosting.

Ok im going to show you pro’s what i do and hopefully you guys can tell me what i am doing wrong?(:
